nodes.text: Permex was a versatile building material that consisted of mineral-injected polymeric plastic. Known for the ease of its production and pliability, permex could be combined with a number of light-reactive minerals to enhance its already considerable strength, resulting in the production of a material called permacite. Klaus Vandangante utilized a few slabs of permex to construct a simple structure that held the office for his mobile outlaw tech base.
The Santhe/Sienar Technologies Corporate Headquarters on the planet Lianna utilized permex in its construction.
